name: Panda Bubble Pop-Free Pop Bubble Shoot Mania games
name_original: Panda Bubble Pop-Free Pop Bubble Shoot Mania games
description:
Panda Bubble Pop is a new and super additive puzzle game!

Throw bubble and match colors to pop and drop your way to victory.
Strategic and intuitive gameplay make for a challenging and satisfying bull popping experience!

BUBBLE POP SHOOTER FEATURES:
-Match and pop bubbles to get more scores to clear the level
-Four props to make you win so easy!
-Master your bubble shooting skill and use strategy to crack tricky levels in this fun game

Bubble Pop Shooter! - It is completely free to play,but there are optional in-app purchases available.
